name: PAYDEMIC
description:
UPDATED VERSION HERE

On the link is where i'll be updating the game, you can play it if you want, the Jam version still will be here in Itch.io, no new build for the moment.

<-CONTROLS-> WASD- Move Left Click- Touch Right Click- Use / Upgrade Tiles TAB- Buy Menu

With your cool Cookie clicker APP! You can crip the economy and taxes! Earn a ton of money and extend your house, buy great props and have fun!

<-FUTURE UPDATE->

However.. On this Paydemic..neightbors are a problem, they will try to hunt you down, if you are too poor, they will grief your house, if you are too rich you might fight them in the night!!
